page.title: 16ATTITUDES OF THREE LADIES.
page.content: We are doing a survey about the type of likes and dislikes about Eyam.We interviewed three ladies from the village. One has been living here all of her life, one has been living here a good number of years and the other lady moved to Eyam in 1984. We wrote out a letter to ask if we could interview them about Eyam. We walked to their houses but one lady came to school for us to interview her here. These are the questions we asked. {1.Do you think there ought to be any {changes in Eyam / if so what changes? {2. Do you like living in Eyam ? why/ {whynot/ {3.Do you find enough things happening {in Eyam? {4.Would you like to live elsewhere, if {so where? {5.Did you live elsewhere before you {lived here? }
